name: The Legend of Dragon
description:
You play as a dragon living in a castle, learning the harmony of the elements. But one day, the leader of the bandits comes to you in the form of an orc and demands to give him your jewelry. At your refusal, the leader of the evil one snorted and promised to capture the dragon's lair and its gold. Your task is to keep them away from you and from the entrance to the treasury

The main theme of the GameJam is "Less is more" the less you press the attack button (any attack) the more damage you do.
